description.zh: 本課程將邀請專家學者以專題演講方式，介紹電力工程之最新科技與應用。研究生亦被安排報告其研究計畫與進度。參與者透過密集討論、書面報告、或舉行口頭發表等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的認識。
description.en: This course will introduce the latest technology and application on the power engineering via seminar. Speakers are the Well-known scholars and specialists. Graduate students will also be arranged to report their graduate studies. The participants are encouraged to have intensive discussion, written reports, or further oral presentation. Efficient opinion exchange would be also expected to derive more extensive interest.

Renowned researchers and scholoars are invited to share their research results and experience through extensive discussion.  Furthermore, all students in this course are required to make formal presentations on their specialized topics.

Renowned researchers and scholars are invited to share their research results and experience through extensive discussion. description.zh: 此課程在介紹 Optimal Control 的理論基礎與其應用﹐範圍從古典的早期發展到最新的進展都包括在內，其目的在使同學能具有最佳控制器設計能力。 內容包括：最佳化問題求解、線性二次調整器設計、線性二次高斯觀測器設計。此外，現代控制中常用的 loop shaping 及 loop transfer recovery 技術亦將在課程中介紹。預修課程 ： 線性控制系統 (可同時修)、工程數學
description.en: 1.	Introduction.2.	Mathematical preliminaries for optimal control.3.	Classical linear quadratic optimal control, including regulation & tracking control.4.	Observer based optimal control (LQG control). 5.	Loop shaping and LTR control.  This is a course designed for graduate students which will provide techniques that can help you to design an optimal controller for linear systems with a specific performance index. Concepts such as optimality condition, linear quadratic regulation (LQR), and linear quadratic gaussian (LQG) problem are introduced in the course. In addition, the course also includes the loop shaping concept and the loop transfer recovery (LTR) technique which are frequently used in the modern control.

description.zh: 電力相關領域專題講座
description.en: Special selected topics on power engineering area

description.zh: RF 系統簡介、RF 設計概念、傳輸線分析、史密斯圖、調變與偵測、多工汲取技術、無線傳輸標準、發射器架構、RF 濾波器設計、RF 主動元件與模型、匹配與偏壓網路、低雜訊放大器與混波器、震盪器、頻率合成器與 RF 電源放大器設計等。
description.en: English Description General Induction，Basic Concepts in RF Design，Transmission Line Analysis，The Smith Chart，Modulation and Detection，Multiple Access Techniques and wireless Standards，Transceiver Architectures，An Overview of RF Filter Design，Active RF Components，Active RF component Modeling，Matching and Biasing Networks，Low-noise Amplifier and Mixers，Oscillators，Frequency Synthesizers，Power Amplifiers。

notes: 電機所和電資外生所合開

description.zh: 硬體描述語言介紹、FPGA 製作、特殊應用積體電路設計、CMOS 邏輯電路設計與合成、數位電路時序調整、比較器、取樣保持電路、參考電壓與線性轉導電路、基本信號轉換電路介紹、數位類比轉換電路、類比數位轉換電路、超取樣轉換電路、鎖相迴路設計、雜訊與不良匹配分析等單元。
description.en: Verilog and VHDL, FPGA, ASIC, Combinational logic gates in CMOS, Timing issues in digital circuits, Comparator, Sample and Hold, Voltage reference, Translinear circuit, Data converter fundamentals, Nyquist-rate DAC, Nyquist-rate ADC, Oversampling converters, PLL, Noise and Mismatch.

description.zh: 此課程包含以下主題：(1) 直流馬達、伺服馬達、及永磁交流馬達的建模、控制系統設計與模擬，(2) 馬達速度及位置觀測器設計與模擬，(3) 數位控制及驅動器設計與模擬。
description.en: The contents of this course include: (1) Modeling, control system design, and simulation of DC motor, servo motor and permanent magnet synchronous motor. (2) Motor speed and position estimator design and simulation. (3) Digital control and driver design and simulation.

name.zh: 電機控制系統設計與模擬
name.en: Design and Simulation of Electric Machine Control Systems

description.zh: 以並行計算架構和分散式系統的開始，探討當代的雲端運算基礎設施，它們是如何部署在亞馬遜、谷歌和蘋果等公司，以及雲端運算應用的領域，如醫療保健、銀行和科學。也探討如何成功地使用虛擬化、資源管理和適量的網絡支持，包括內容分發網絡和存儲區域網絡，以在企業用戶部署雲端運算的應用
description.en: Beginning with a discussion of parallel computing and architectures and distributed systems, the course turns to contemporary cloud infrastructures, how they are being deployed at leading companies such as Amazon, Google and Apple, and how they can be applied in fields such as healthcare, banking and science. The course also examines how to successfully deploy a cloud application across the enterprise using virtualization, resource management and the right amount of networking support, including content delivery networks and storage area networks.

description.zh: 由於雲端運算的快速發展，大量資料收集與儲存技術已成瓶頸，大數據技術與管理提供一套具延展性與容錯能力的分散儲存與計算架構，能有效處理大量複雜數據資料的儲存與運算。本課程除介紹現有的大數據生態與趨勢，並針對目前軟硬體架構的處理瓶頸，提供系統組態與部署、服務層級協定、監控與管理等系統性規劃的解決方案，並導入跨領域的工程管理科學知識。課程簡扼論述大數據技術與管理的重要，並在 Hadoop 生態系統中，以 Cloudera Hadoop 為應用範例，實作說明其重要性。課程內容包括：大數據的概念、應用生態與趨勢、Hadoop 硬體規格與基礎架構規劃、叢集組態與部署、叢集服務層級協定、叢集監控與管理、相關生態技術、及概略介紹 Hadoop 認證與準備。
description.en: The course will introduce Apache Hadoop core technologies and administration with its major including: Big Data (BD) in demand and its application trend, Core technologies of Hadoop for BD management, Hadoop Administration and management tool, Hadoop cluster deployment,YARN applications plus MapReduce, Hadoop cluster hardware and software, Introduction of Hadoop ecosystem projects, HDFS configuration for high availability (HA), Hadoop security, Cluster resource scheduling and configuration, and Hadoop certification program, etc.

notes: 日職電機所和 AI 學程合開

description.zh: 本課程主要針對電力電子與其相關應用進行探討，內容著重於電能轉換技術、現代化科技與新世代產品之結合。課程主題如下: (1) 電能處理簡介 (2) 基本電力轉換器 (3) 回授控制器設計 (4) 太陽能電池特性 (5) 最大功率追蹤技術 (6) 電池特性與充放電技術 (7) 逆變器電路與技術 (8) 再生能源發電系統 (9) 電動車驅動系統
description.en: This course focuses on the Power Electronic technologies and related applications. The combination of the electrical energy conversion techniques, modern technologies and next generation products will be included. Main topics of this course are as follows: (1) Introduction of Electrical Energy Processing (2) Basic Power Converters(3) Feedback Controller Design(4) Solar Cell Characteristics (5) Maximum Power Point Tracking(6) Battery Characteristics and Charging/Discharging Technologies(7) Inverter Circuits and Technologies(8) Renewable Energy Generation System(9) Driving System of Electric Vehicles

notes: 電機所和電資外生所合開

description.zh: 1. 類神經網路簡介 2. 淺層類神經網路 3. 深層類神經網路 4. 遞歸類神經網路 5. 長短期記憶類神經網路 6. 卷積類神經網路 7. 深度強化學習
description.en: 1. Introduction to Neural Networks2. Shallow Neural Networks3. Deep Neural Networks4. Recurrent Neural Networks5. Long Short-term Memory Neural Networks6. Convolutional Neural Networks7. Deep Reinforcement Learning

notes: 電機所、電資外生所和 AI 學程合開

description.zh: 錯誤控制技術是推動現代行動通訊超大量傳輸、超高可靠度與超低延遲等特性的重要技術之一。本課程旨在介紹現代無線行動通訊之錯誤控制技術之設計原理與應用，內容涵蓋：(1) 無線行動通訊技術之錯誤控制技術簡介 (2) 基礎通道編碼理論與通道容量之介紹 (3) 渦輪碼之原理與設計 (4) 低密度校驗矩陣碼之原理與設計 (5) 極化碼之原理與法設計 (6) 混合式自動重送請求技術之原理與設計。
description.en: Error control technology is one of the key enablers for boosting the strict performance of modern mobile communication systems (e.g., extremely-high data rate/reliability and ultra-low latency). This course aims at helping students acquire the knowledge about the applications and design principles of the error control techniques adopted in modern mobile communication systems, covering: (1) Introduction to error control techniques for mobile communication systems, (2) Introduction to basic channel coding theory and channel capacity, (3) Principles and designs of turbo codes, (4) Principles and designs of low-density parity-check (LDPC) codes, (5) Principles and design of polar codes, and (6) Principles and design of hybrid automatic retransmission requests (HARQ) technologies.

name.zh: 現代行動通訊錯誤控制技術
name.en: Error Control Technologies for Modern Mobile Communication Systems

notes: 電機所和電資外生所合開

description.zh: 課程主要為介紹學術界最新的深度學習研究成果，教導學員使用 Python 深度學習套件，讓學員能將深度學習技術應用於各個不同的領域。課程內容包括：? 車牌與門牌數字辨識？人臉辨識？1000 種影像分類？辨識 9000 種物件？自動駕駛模擬？嵌入式深度學習演算法？空虛，寂寞，覺得冷？讓深度學習來幫助你:? 遞迴式神經網路 (RNN)：找不到人聊天？訓練自己的聊天機器人？對抗生成網路 (GAN)：用 GAN 產生自己的夢中情人？深度強化學習 (DRL)：訓練 AI 跟你一起玩遊戲
description.en: The goal of this course is to introduce latest deep learning researches and allow students to develop deep learning applications using Python library (TensorFlow & Keras). The content includes:?Number recognition of License plate and Doorplate?Face Recognition?1000 Image Classification?9000 Object Detection?Autopilot simulation?Embedded Deep Learning Algorithms?Convolutional Neural Networks (CNN)?Recurrent Neural Networks (RNN)?Long-Short Term Memory (LSTM)?Generative Adversarial Networks (GAN)?Deep Reinforcement Learning
